table.name: view_email_address
table.viewSql: select `eurobug`.`email_address`.`id` AS `id`,concat(`eurobug`.`email_address`.`local`,'@',`eurobug`.`email_domain`.`value`) AS `email_address` from (`eurobug`.`email_address` join `eurobug`.`email_domain` on((`eurobug`.`email_address`.`domain_id` = `eurobug`.`email_domain`.`id`)))

table.name: view_form_button
table.viewSql: select `view_form_element`.`element_id` AS `element_id`,`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` AS `element_type_meta`,`view_form_element`.`form_id` AS `form_id`,`view_form_element`.`form_meta` AS `form_meta`,`view_form_element`.`language_id` AS `language_id`,`view_form_element`.`language_code` AS `language_code`,`view_form_element`.`message` AS `message` from `eurobug`.`view_form_element` where (`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` = 'form_element_button')

table.name: view_form_element
table.viewSql: select `eurobug`.`article`.`id` AS `element_id`,`eurobug`.`article_type`.`meta` AS `element_type_meta`,`view_article_category_meta`.`id` AS `form_id`,`view_article_category_meta`.`meta` AS `form_meta`,`eurobug`.`language`.`id` AS `language_id`,`eurobug`.`language`.`code` AS `language_code`,`eurobug`.`article_localized`.`message` AS `message` from (((((`eurobug`.`article` join `eurobug`.`article_localized` on((`eurobug`.`article`.`id` = `eurobug`.`article_localized`.`article_id`))) join `eurobug`.`article_type` on((`eurobug`.`article`.`type_id` = `eurobug`.`article_type`.`id`))) join `eurobug`.`language` on((`eurobug`.`article_localized`.`language_id` = `eurobug`.`language`.`id`))) join `eurobug`.`article_classification` on((`eurobug`.`article`.`id` = `eurobug`.`article_classification`.`article_id`))) join `eurobug`.`view_article_category_meta` on((`view_article_category_meta`.`id` = `eurobug`.`article_classification`.`article_category_id`)))

table.name: view_form_label
table.viewSql: select `view_form_element`.`element_id` AS `element_id`,`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` AS `element_type_meta`,`view_form_element`.`form_id` AS `form_id`,`view_form_element`.`form_meta` AS `form_meta`,`view_form_element`.`language_id` AS `language_id`,`view_form_element`.`language_code` AS `language_code`,`view_form_element`.`message` AS `message` from `eurobug`.`view_form_element` where (`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` = 'form_element_label')

table.name: view_form_legend
table.viewSql: select `view_form_element`.`element_id` AS `element_id`,`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` AS `element_type_meta`,`view_form_element`.`form_id` AS `form_id`,`view_form_element`.`form_meta` AS `form_meta`,`view_form_element`.`language_id` AS `language_id`,`view_form_element`.`language_code` AS `language_code`,`view_form_element`.`message` AS `message` from `eurobug`.`view_form_element` where (`view_form_element`.`element_type_meta` = 'form_element_legend')
